title.en: Inclusion of Children who Differ from Peers

structural_units.address:
Jakobi 5
51005 Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en:
List of topics:
- Types of special needs and their characteristics.
- Assessing the child's development and preparing a development description.
- Developing the cognitive and learning skills, play and creativity of a child who is different from his or her peers.
- Possibilities to support the child's development in a group, adaptation of the development environment and use of aids in teaching. Different teaching methods and possibilities to adapt them, taking into account the specifics of children.
- Preparation of an individual development plan and its implementation.
- Communication and use of communication tools.
- Cooperation with parents, development interview.
- Cooperation with colleagues.
- School readiness card and its completion.
description.et:
Läbitavate teemade loetelu:
- Erivajaduste liigid ja neile iseloomulikud tunnused.
- Lapse arengu hindamine ja arengukirjelduse koostamine.
- Eakaaslastest eristuva lapse tunnetus- ja õpioskuste, mängu ning loovuse arendamine.
- Lapse arengu toetamise võimalused rühmas, arengukeskkonna kohandamine ja abivahendite kasutamine õppetöös. Erinevad õpetamismeetodid ja nende kohandamise võimalused, arvestades laste eripäradega.
- Individuaalse arenduskava koostamine ja selle rakendamine.
- Suhtlemine ja suhtlust toetavate vahendite kasutamine.
- Koostöö lapsevanematega, arenguvestlus.
- Koostöö kolleegidega
- Koolivalmiduskaart ja selle täitmine.

objectives.en: The aim of this course is to raise awareness about noticing children in need of support, creating a learning and growth environment conducive to development, and planning and implementing learning and educational activities. Expand and involve children in a kindergarten group.
objectives.et: Selle kursuse eesmärk on tõsta teadlikkust tuge vajavate laste märkamisel, arenguks soodsa õpi- ja kasvukeskkonna loomisel, õppe- ja kasvatustegevuste planeerimisel ning rakendamisel. Laiendada teadmisi ja oskusi seoses teistest eristuvate laste kaasamisega lasteaiarühmas.

learning_outcomes.en: - knows the features that indicate special needs and notices a different learner in the learning process;
learning_outcomes.et: -  teab erivajadustele viitavaid tunnuseid ja märkab õppeprotsessis teistest eristuvat õppijat;

learning_outcomes.en: - assesses the level of development of the problem in different areas (varying the severity of activities) and describe the results obtained;
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab hinnata lapse üldist arengutaset erinevates valdkondades (varieerides tegevuste raskusastet) ning kirjeldada saadud tulemusi;

learning_outcomes.en: - prepares an individual development plan for a child in need of support;
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab koostada tuge vajavale lapsele individuaalset arenduskava.

learning_outcomes.en: - plans teaching based on the developmental levels of the group's children and the need for additional support;
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab planeerida õpetamist lähtudes rühma laste arengutasemetest ja lisatoe vajadustest;

learning_outcomes.en: - creates a learning and growth environment favorable for the development of children in kindergarten;
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab luua lasteaias laste arengule soodsat õpi- ja kasvukeskkonda;

learning_outcomes.en: - makes and values cooperation with colleagues and parents.
learning_outcomes.et: - teeb ja väärtustab koostööd kolleegide ja lapsevanematega
